original: @219b ` // rma bya chen mo sgrub thabs bzhugs /
analyzed: @219b ` // rma bya chen mo sgrub thabs bzhugs /

original: * // de bzhin du sngar bstan ba'i cho gas stong pa nyid kyi rjes la sna tshogs padma dang zla ba la /
analyzed: * // de bzhin du sngar bstan ba'i cho gas stong pa nyid kyi rjes la sna tshogs padma dang zla ba la /
translated: In the same way, after emptiness, as previously explained in the ritual, on a multicolored lotus and moon,

original: mam yig ljang gu yongs su gyur pa las /
analyzed: mam yig ljang gu yongs su gyur pa las /

original: 'phags ma rma bya chen mo mdog ljang gu / zhal gsum pa /
analyzed: 'phags ma rma bya chen mo mdog ljang gu / zhal gsum pa /
translated: one becomes Noble MahƒÅmƒÅy≈´rƒ´, green, with three faces,

original: zhal so so la spyan gsum pa ste /
analyzed: zhal so so la spyan gsum pa ste /

original: zhal g-yas dang g-yon sngon po dang dkar po'o //
analyzed: zhal g-yas dang g-yon sngon po dang dkar po'o //
translated: The right and left faces are blue and white.

original: g-yas kyi phyag gsum la go rims bzhin du rma bya'i mjug sgro dang / mda' dang mchog sbyin pa'o //
analyzed: g-yas kyi phyag gsum la go rims bzhin du rma bya'i mjug sgro dang / mda' dang mchog sbyin pa'o //
translated: In the three right hands, in order, are a peacock feather, an arrow, and a boon-granting gesture.

original: phyag g-yon pa gsum na rin po che'i snye ma dang / gzhu dang / phang par gnas pa'i bum pa'o //
analyzed: phyag g-yon pa gsum na rin po che'i snye ma dang / gzhu dang / phang par gnas pa'i bum pa'o //
translated: In the three left hands are a jewel and flower, a bow, and a vase resting in the lap.

original: sna tshogs pa'i rgyan dang sham thabs can /
analyzed: sna tshogs pa'i rgyan dang sham thabs can /
translated: She has various ornaments and a skirt.

original: sgeg pa lang tsho la bab pa'i cha lugs can /üîΩzla ba'i 'od dang ldan pa'i gdan can /
analyzed: sgeg pa lang tsho la bab pa'i cha lugs can / zla ba'i 'od dang ldan pa'i gdan can /
translated: She has the attire of a youthful, voluptuous woman.üîΩShe sits on a moon-disc seat.
She sits in the half-lotus posture.

original: don yod grub pa'i dbu rgyan can du skad cig gis bskyed la /
analyzed: don yod grub pa'i dbu rgyan can du skad cig gis bskyed la /
translated: Instantly generate yourself as the Goddess, with the crown of Amoghasiddhi.

original: de'i spyi bo dang / lkog ma dang / snying ga dang / lte ba rnams su zla ba la go rims ji lta bar /
analyzed: de'i spyi bo dang / lkog ma dang / snying ga dang / lte ba rnams su zla ba la go rims ji lta bar /
translated: At her head, throat, heart, and navel, on moon-discs, in order,

original: aom a'a: mam h'um zhes pa'i yi ge bsams te spro ba dang bsdu ba bya'o //
analyzed: aom a'a: mam h'um zhes pa'i yi ge bsams te spro ba dang bsdu ba bya'o //
translated: are the syllables Om, Ah, Ma, and Hum. Imagine them and do the emanation and re-absorption.

original: de nas ngal na sngags bzlas par bya ste /
analyzed: de nas ngal na sngags bzlas par bya ste /
translated: Then, if you are tired, recite the mantra.

original: aom ma h'a m'a y'u ri bidy'a r'a dzny'i h'um h'um phat phat sv'a h'a /
analyzed: aom ma h'a m'a y'u ri bidy'a r'a dzny'i h'um h'um phat phat sv'a h'a /
translated: Om Mahamayaurvi Dharani Raja Hri Hri Pha·π≠ Pha·π≠ SvƒÅhƒÅ.

original: zhes pa'o // 'phags ma rma bya chen mo'i sgrub thabs rdzogs so//
analyzed: zhes pa'o // 'phags ma rma bya chen mo'i sgrub thabs rdzogs so//
translated: The sadhana of Noble Mahamaya is complete.
